sentences.sContent: He said that despite older adults being less “loquacious” or talkative than their younger adult counterparts, they elicit much more vocal responses when calling.
sentences.sContent_eng: He said that despite older adults being less “loquacious” or talkative than their younger adult counterparts, they elicit much more vocal responses when calling.
sentences.sCn: 他说，不管老人不太“饶舌”还是比年轻同伴更多话，他们呼叫时都能激发更多的语音回应。

remMethod.val: loqu (说话) + aci + ous (…的) → 老说话的 → 多话的

trans.tranOther: a loquacious person likes to talk a lot
